title: Any way to get the client's replay and convert it into a mp4 file?
body:
The title is my question.
I also don't mean by only recording it as that's really long.

Thank you.

replies.body: Replays are still in testing and I'm not sure if converting them to mp4's are available, and I wasn't able to find anything in the [replay ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide on it.  Hit up our [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) guide to offer any feedback or see fellow testers can find a way.  Good luck!
